pr_title: Created attribute definitions for member profile

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer not to add this attribute. It is used by a single member on cesnet instance, nobody at MU/Elixir. We use user:virt attrs to show all affiliations of the user. I'll prepare a commit removing this from the profile in GUI and it can be removed from here too.
timeline.author: zlamalp

timeline.bodyText: We will probably remove this attribute too, but not immediately, so you can keep it.
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: I managed to remove all internal usage of member:virt:loa. Please remove it from attributes initialization. Then it can be merged. Thank you.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Created attribute definitions for member profile

- Created attribute definition which were missing in member profile in
  VO. They are now created during the initialization of Perun.
